bibl.author: Shōgaito, Masahiro
bibl.title: The Fanwangjing 梵網經 (Brahmajāla-sūtra): A Chinese text transcribed in the Uighur script

imprint.title: Tujue yuwenxue yanyiu : Geng Shimin jiaoshou bashi huadan jinian wenji. Studies in Turkic Philology. Festschrift in honour of the 80th birthday of Professor Geng Shimin.
